About Us

The Idea and inspiration this application is to make life easier for international students during their initial days at a foregin country.

We consider privacy when maintaining standars, Also, we constantly strive to improve and meet all of the needs of the youngsters.

Our Team

Renting or selling

Abroad Buddy is a platform which alows the students to rent houses and it is also a web application hwere local post their.

This is a platform that assists international students in making friends with similar interests and finding housing during their initial stages of arrival in the states.

It also has a cool feature called "Ride Safe" which allows you to carpool with friends and helps drunk students find others who can safely drive them home.
